answers.answer: This question doesn't make a lot of sense to me. Why would you think a sharp pain in your left thigh would indicate diabetes?? Are you having other symptoms that are typical of diabetes, such as unusual thirst and urination, fatigue or weight loss? A sharp pain in your left thigh could mean a multitude of things. If it continues, I would see a doctor.

question: i have been having a sharp pain in my left thigh, could it be diabetes.This discussion is related to/posts/show/551050.
title: sharp pain in left thigh
